edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.simplify.IF

Class Simplify

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.simplify.IF.Simplify

  • public class Simplify
extends java.lang.Object
    Entry point for module "simplify", providing static method to create basic simplifiers, simplifier factories, and range factories.

      • identitySimplifier

        public static Simplifier identitySimplifier(PreUniverse universe,
                            BooleanExpression assumption)
        Creates a new "trivial" simplifier: given any expression this simplifiers just returns the expression.
        Parameters:
        universe - the pre-universe associated to the simplifier
        assumption - the boolean expression context, which is just not used
        Returns:
        the new trivial simplifier

        public static SimplifierFactory newIdentitySimplifierFactory(PreUniverse universe)
        A factory for producing trivial simplifiers.
        Parameters:
        universe - the pre-universe to associate to the simplifier
        Returns:
        a new trivial simplifier factory
        See Also:
